name: Zero Interest Loan for Upgrades
description: Up to $10,000 zero-interest loan for electric heat pump water heaters, heating/AC, electrical panel, and energy efficiency upgrades; no money down, 5-year term
fullDescription: Peninsula Clean Energy offers zero-interest financing to help San Mateo County residents electrify their homes without upfront costs, with convenient repayment through monthly utility bills.
whatTheyOffer:
- Up to $10,000 zero-interest loan
- No money down required
- 5-year repayment term
- Covers heat pump water heaters
- Covers heat pump HVAC systems
- Covers electrical panel upgrades
- Covers energy efficiency improvements
- Repayment on monthly electric bill
howToGetIt:
1. Must be a Peninsula Clean Energy customer
2. Choose qualifying electrification project
3. Get quotes from licensed contractors
4. Apply for financing through PCE
5. Complete installation
6. Loan payments added to monthly electric bill
keywords: zero interest loan, financing, Peninsula Clean Energy, PCE, San Mateo, heat pump, electrification, no money down
